channel.title: Muhammed Berk Önder
channel.description: Recent content on Muhammed Berk Önder

item.title: About me 🐢
item.description: 🤖 I’m a Machine Learning Engineer at P.I. Works 💡 I like to explore the inner workings of the Universe and cook delicious cookies 🍪 🎓 I’m a Master of Science student in Physics at the Istanbul University 🔭 I’m currently working on making a fully autonomus academic researcher LLM agent 🌱 I’m on track for learning more about Retrieval-Augmented Generation, and finding simple ML solutions for complex everyday products 💬 Feel free to reach out to me for Data Science Project consulting and volunteering, or just for some interesting discussion about Data Science, ML, AI, and Physics stuff 📫 You can shoot me an email at berkmonder@gmail.

item.title: Projects
item.description: My Machine Learning Portfolio 🔥 Projects 🚀 Analysis Keywords: EDA, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Seaborn Exploratory Data Analysis on MTA Turnstile Data: Used Pandas, Matplotlib/Seaborn to clean, transform and visualize data to extract insights. Regression Keywords: IMDb Movies Gross Prediction: Used BeautifulSoup to collect and clean job listing data from IMDb.com Forcasting Historical Sales Data: This was a case study that I’ve worked on that relies solely on previeos sale numbers.
